pkgmetadata.longdescription: Projection Predictive Feature Selection // Performs projection predictive feature selection for generalized linear and additive models as well as for generalized linear and additive multilevel models (see Piironen, Paasiniemi and Vehtari, 2020, doi:10.1214/20-EJS1711; Catalina, Brkner and Vehtari, 2022, https://proceedings.mlr.press/v151/catalina22a.html). The package is compatible with the 'rstanarm' and 'brms' packages, but other reference models can also be used. See the documentation as well as the package vignette for more information and examples.
